ValidationRule.description: Prevent both the HRG and Sales Rep fields from being populated on HR Advisory Call Doc Cases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordType.Name = "Service Support HR Services Call Doc Case" && (HRG_Sales_Rep__c != "") && (Sales_Rep__c != ""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The HRG and Sales Rep fields can not be both populated on Service Support HR Services Call Doc Cases
